original: 張魯部下，正史中記載不多，僅提及曹軍攻陽平關時被斬殺。《三國演義》則稱和夏侯淵交手不分勝負，夏侯淵詐敗而退，楊任追擊時被回馬刀刺殺。
text: Zhang Lu's subordinate, there are not many records in official history, only mentioning that Cao Jun was beheaded when he attacked Yangping Pass. 'The Romance of the Three Kingdoms' claimed that Xia Houyuan fought regardless of the outcome, Xia Houyuan lied and retreated, and Yang Ren was assassinated by the saber when he pursued it.
